mapper.sql: sn, userid, bbstype, title, memo1, cnt, afile1, afile2, wdate, email, company, mobile, memo2,ansyn,imgfile
mapper.select: SELECT wiz_bbs.idx,prdcode,tidx,leccode,wiz_bbs.code,wiz_bbscat.catname,prino, grpno,depno,star,memid,memgrp,name,email,subject,content FROM wiz_bbs LEFT OUTER JOIN wiz_bbscat ON wiz_bbs.code = wiz_bbscat.code where wiz_bbs.idx = #{sn}
mapper.insert:
insert into bbs (sn, userid, bbstype, title, memo1, cnt, afile1, afile2, wdate,email, company, mobile, memo2,imgfile ) values (#{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bbstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{afile1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{afile2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{imgfile} )
insert into bbs (etcgoid, wrid, title, memo, btype,wdate ) values ( #{etcgoid}, #{wrid}, #{title}, #{memo}, #{btype}, current_timestamp )

userid,
bbstype,

mapper.update:
update bbs
sn = #{record.sn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bbstype = #{record.bbstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo1 = #{record.memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cnt = #{record.cnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
afile1 = #{record.afile1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
afile2 = #{record.afile2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wdate = #{record.wdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{record.company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo2 = #{record.memo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update bbs
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bbstype = #{bbstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo1 = #{memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cnt = #{cnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
afile1 = #{afile1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
afile2 = #{afile2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wdate = #{wdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo2 = #{memo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bbs set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bbstype = #{bbstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo1 = #{memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cnt = #{cnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, afile1 = #{afile1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, afile2 = #{afile2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wdate = #{wdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
